edu.umd.cs.psl.reasoner.function

Class MutableAtomFunctionVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.reasoner.function.AtomFunctionVariable
      • edu.umd.cs.psl.reasoner.function.MutableAtomFunctionVariable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FunctionSingleton, FunctionTerm, FunctionVariable

    public class MutableAtomFunctionVariable
extends AtomFunctionVariable
    Encapsulates the value of a RandomVariableAtom for use in numeric functions.

    This FunctionVariable can change the truth value or confidence value of the RandomVariableAtom.
